messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: World of Warcraft- Find my kids!
messages.msgSnippet: ***We d probably even be willing to level up a toon on another realm just to get to group up with some fellow unschoolers!*** We have quite a few characters on
messages.messageBody:
***We'd probably even be willing

to level up a toon on another realm just to get to group up with some

fellow unschoolers!***

We have quite a few characters on Argent Dawn and I know quite a few other unschooling friends that have just started characters there too.  Argent Dawn is a role playing realm but you don't have to role play to be on it.

Feel free to e-mail me if you're wanting to create characters there.  I have a 77 mage, and lots of other toons and my 2 daughters also have characters on that realm.  My son also plays but he's in a serious raiding guild on another realm.  He only plays now when he has a raid.

Kelli~
  http://ourjoyfullife.blogspot.com/%c2%a0

"There are no ordinary moments."  Dan Millman,  Peaceful Warrior







[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: World of Warcraft- Find my kids!
messages.msgSnippet: We are on Haoramush, though my son has created toons on other realms when ours isn t finished with the restart on Tuesday morning, that way he can play sooner
messages.messageBody:
We are on Haoramush, though my son has created toons on other realms
when ours isn't finished with the restart on Tuesday morning, that
way he can play sooner :)

My son is 7, and has a 76 alliance lock. I have a 58 mage, hubby has
a 72 rogue, and our daughters that are 4 share a 28 shaman. The girls
like to go around wetlands or exodar area and get the reindeer or
toads, skunks, squirrels, etc. My son doesn't read a lot, or type a
bunch, but sure knows how to use the mic ;) He's really been into
raiding lately. He only needs the Oggrimar boss to get his black war
mount.

I'd love to find someone on our realm! We'd probably even be willing
to level up a toon on another realm just to get to group up with some
fellow unschoolers!

Tiffany


>
> Anyone in Echo Isles? I have a 17 year old son, 16 year old son,
and 15 year old daughter there. Nua, Malrin, and Amyndi.
> Anyone want to connect?
>
)

> Are there any unschoolers in the Hydraxis realm? My 16 yo
daughter is on that realm and I would love to have her connect with
other homeschoolers.
> Sue
>

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: World of Warcraft- Find my kids!
messages.msgSnippet: Anyone in Echo Isles?  I have a 17 year old son, 16 year old son, and 15 year old daughter there.  Nua, Malrin, and Amyndi. Anyone want to connect? Judy
messages.messageBody:
Anyone in Echo Isles? I have a 17 year old son, 16 year old son, and 15 year old daughter there. Nua, Malrin, and Amyndi.
Anyone want to connect?

Judy Arnall, Peaceful Parenting, Family and Relationship Expert, Speaker (Professional Member of CAPS) and Author of "Discipline Without Distress: 135 tools for raising caring, responsible children without time-out, spanking, punishment or bribery" www.professionalparenting.ca Tele: (403) 714-6766 Email jarnall@... "Peace In The World Begins In The Home"

---- Original Message -----
From: Sue Roenke
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, January 15, 2009 3:32 PM
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Re: World of Warcraft ( was: Advice needed)



Are there any unschoolers in the Hydraxis realm? My 16 yo daughter is on that realm and I would love to have her connect with other homeschoolers.
Sue
